167128.「恵みの木の中に こんな世界があるなんて\n いったい どうなってるの！？:
What the hell is going on in this world inside
the Grace Tree?

167130.「でも…… もしかして ここを調べれば\n あたしにだけ聞こえる ふしぎな声の手:
But... perhaps if I check here, I might be
able to find some clues to the mysterious
voices that only I can hear?

167132.「あれ <pc>！？\n どうして キミが こんな所に？: Oh, my God. What are you doing here?

167134.「手に持ってる その本 なーに？: What's that book in your hand?

167135.「……どうしてか わからないけれど\n あたし その本が すごく気になる……。:
I don't know why, but I'm really interested in
that book.

167137.「あのー ここです。ここですよー！: Um, here it is. It's here!

167138.「あっ。リルチェラ！\n キミの その肩のところ……: Ah. Lilcherat! That shoulder of yours...

167139.「やっと 皆さんに 声が届くようになりました。\n いやはや ここまで 長い道の:
Finally, our voices can be heard. It has been
a long road.

167140.「えっ えっ！？\n なになに？ どういうこと？: What? What? What what? What do you mean?

167141.「申し遅れましたが 私 \n 花の民プクリポを創りたまいし神\n ピナヘトの神獣:
I apologize for the delay, but my name is Sinaridi, God Beast Sinaridi of Pinaheto, the god who created Pukulipo, the people of
flowers.

167142.「氷の領界を 守護し\n 緑の者と ゆかりが深い\n 神獣とでも 言えばいいでし:
The beast of God who protects the Ice Realm
and is closely associated with the Green One.

167143.「……リルチェラ。あなたが 恵みの木を治すため\n 緑の者として 覚醒した時のこ:
...Lilcherat. Do you remember when you
awakened as a green one to heal the Grace
Tree?

167144.「あの時 あなたに 呼びかけたのは\n 私の声だったのです。あれ以来 ずっと\n:
It was my voice that called out to you then. I
have been by your side watching over you ever
since.

167145.「そ…そうだったの！？\n あたし 全然 気づかなかったよ。:
Oh...that's right! I didn't notice that at
all.

167146.「……無理もないことです。恵みの木が\n 凍りついた際に 私のチカラも弱まってし:
It is not surprising. When the Grace Tree
froze over, my strength weakened, and I have
been dedicated to recovering.

167147.「そして 今 あなたたちが 停滞していた\n この世界の流れを活性化させたことで:
And now that you have revitalized the stagnant
flow of this world, it has finally regained
its original power.

167148.「えーと。つまり 氷の領界の神獣であるキミが\n リルチェラに 呼びかけて\n:
Let's see. So, Kimi, the divine beast of the
Ice Realm, called out to Lilcherat and led her
to this place, this book.

167149.「それは ボクたちが追ってきた\n 万象流転の書 そのものが\n アストルティア:
That is because the Book of All Things, which
we have been following, is the will of the
gods of Astoltia.

167150.「はい。お気づきの通り この 万象流転の書には\n それぞれの領界を 見守ってき:
Yes. As you are aware, this Book of All Things
contains the power of the species deities that
have watched over their respective realms.

167151.「本来ならば 神々の導きにしたがって\n ナドラガンドに 救いをもたらすのは\n:
Essentially, it is my own role, as the divine beast entrusted with the book, to bring salvation to Nadragand according to the
guidance of the gods.

167152.「しかし 邪悪なる意志と名乗る者に\n チカラを奪われた 私は\n 他の誰かに:
But the one who calls himself Evil Will took
my power, and I had no choice but to leave it
to someone else...

167153.「巻き込むような形とはいえ リルチェラや\n <pc>さん サジェさんの協力のお:
Even though it was a bit of a roll-up, thanks
to Lilcherat and <pc> Sajay's help,
we were able to fulfill our mission.

167154.「そのことには 深く感謝しております。\n ですから どうか 私からの お礼を\:
For that, I am deeply grateful. So, please,
would you accept my gratitude?

167155.「この シナリディ秘蔵のとっておき……\n きっと 気に入っていただけると 思い:
We think you'll love this Sinaridi's best-kept
secret!

167156.「じゃあ それは <pc>さんに あげて。\n １番 がんばってくれたのは\n:
Well, give it to <pc>, since he's the
one who did the most work!

167158.「ああ。ボクも そう言おうと 思っていた。\n ボクは ただ 自分の知的好奇心の:
Yeah, that's what I was going to say. That's
what I was going to say. I was just following
my intellectual curiosity.

167159.「それに 当初の ボクの目的だった\n 闇の領界の環境を よくするということは\:
Besides, I can say that my original goal of
improving the environment of the Dark Realm
has been fulfilled.

167160.「うん。あたしも 竜族の世界が\n よくなっていくのを見てると うれしかった。\:
I was happy to see the world of the dragon tribe getting better. I was also happy to see the dragon tribe's world getting better.
That's the best reward of all.

167161.「竜族のみんなが 幸せになるために\n 少しでも あたしたちが 役に立てたなら\:
If we can be of any help at all to the
happiness of the dragon tribe, that's all that
matters.

167163.「わかりました。では 私からのお礼は\n あとで 私に話しかけて お受け取りくだ:
I understand. Then please accept my thanks by
talking to me later. I will be waiting for you
on the stone monument.

167164.「あー。でもね……。\n いっこだけ ある……かも。\n あたしの ほしいもの。:
Ah. But... there might be one thing...
Something I want.

167165.「このまま サジェくんと会えなくなっちゃうのは\n その…… さみしいかなって…:
I thought it would be sad that I won't be able
to see you anymore, so I thought I'd keep in
touch with Sajay. I...

167166.「会えるよ いつだって。\n <pc>が ５つの領界を\n つないでくれたんだか:
You'll see me. Whenever you want. The
<pc> has connected the five realms.

167167.「本当！？\n それならまた あたしと一緒に 遊んでくれる？: Really? Then will you play with me again?

167168.「……まぁ。遊ぶかどうかは ともかくとして\n 会いたいなら 会えばいいと ボク:
Well... Whether you want to play or not, if
you want to see him, I think you should see
him. What's the hold up?

167169.「よかったぁ。あたし この本の調査が\n 全部 終わっちゃったら サジェくんと\:
I'm so glad. I was thinking that I would have
to say bye-bye to Sajay after all the research
for this book was done/

167170.「それじゃあさ！ これからも ふたりで\n 竜族の世界を もっと よくする方法を:
Well then! Why don't we continue to think and
search for ways to make the world of the
dragon tribe a better place?

167171.「そんなふうに サジェくんと\n ずっと ずーっと 一緒に過ごしていけたら\n:
I think it would be wonderful if I could spend
all my time with Sajay like that! Promise?

167172.「ずっとって それ……\n 本気で ずっと？: All the time? You mean, like, all the time?

167173.「キミが そう言うなら…… \n ボクも……まぁ いいけど……。:
Well, if you say so, then I guess that's okay,
but...

167174.「ふふっ。こんな 子供たちが これからの\n 竜族の未来を になっていくのなら…:
Hmmm. If children like these are going to be
the future of the dragon tribe... then I guess
there's nothing to worry about.

167175.「<pc>さん。ありがとうございます。\n あなたのおかげで この世界は\n 新:
<pc>. Thank you. Because of you, this
world is moving into a new future.

167260.「どうか あの子たちが作っていく 竜族の世界が\n 明るく あたたかなもので あ:
Please pray that the world of the dragon tribe that they will create will be bright and warm... and that I, too, will be there to
watch over them. I will watch over them.
